AboutUs.title: About Us

intro.company: Andreas Petsas and Sons Public Ltd,
intro.pioneer: a pioneer in the Cyprus car rental business since 1962,
intro.description: ranks amongst the largest self-drive car hire and car leasing companies in its sector. With a fleet of approximately 1800 vehicles of various types and makes, ranging from economy to luxury, saloon, minibuses, cabrios, 4x4 jeeps, it covers almost every demand in the field of car hire.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: With the reliance of more than 60 years of presence in the Cyprus car rental market, the company aims at continued modernisation and offer of vehicles and services for a far-fetching and economically competitive service to customers. Our goal is to offer our customers an enjoyable experience, with reliable cars, excellent quality of service as well as favourable rental conditions and our staff is appropriately trained to carry out this task in an efficient and effective manner.

fleet.title: Our Fleet
fleet.text: Our extensive fleet of approximately 1800 vehicles includes a wide variety of makes and models, ranging from economical city cars to luxurious sedans, spacious minibuses, stylish cabriolets, and rugged 4x4 jeeps, ensuring we can meet any car rental requirement.

presence.title: Our Presence
presence.text: The company maintains offices in all major towns and holiday resorts of the free area of Cyprus as well as at Larnaka and Pafos International Airports and provides 24 hour service to all of its customers all the year round.

AboutUs.quote: Our goal is to offer our customers an enjoyable experience, with reliable cars, excellent quality of service as well as favourable rental conditions.

quality.title: Quality and Reliability
quality.text: We are committed to providing reliable cars and excellent service to ensure an enjoyable and hassle-free experience for our customers.

modernization.title: Continuous Modernization
modernization.text: We constantly aim to modernize our fleet and services to offer competitive and cutting-edge solutions in the car rental market.

ContactUs.title: Contact Us
